id: Trump Indicates Government Shutdown Still in Play
paragraph:
November 17, 2018WASHINGTON -- President Trump indicated Saturday that a partial government shutdown next month remains on the table as leverage to secure $5 billion in funding from Congress for his border wall.“This would be a very good time to do a shutdown,” he told reporters on Saturday. “I don’t think it’s going to be necessary, because I think the Democrats will come to their senses.”Mr....
